edu.luc.cs.trull
Interface Combinator

All Superinterfaces:
Component, java.util.EventListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, PropertyChangeSource, Startable, Suspendable, Terminating
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCombinator
public interface Combinator
extends Component

A building block for building complex components from existing components.

Method Summary

          Adds a component to this combinator.
